content:
<rule id="quarkus-logging-sentry-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="sentry-jul" groupId="io.sentry"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'sentry-jul' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-logging-sentry' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `io.sentry:sentry-jul` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-logging-sentry`  
                        Further information in the link below.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/logging-sentry" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
